message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe you'll find very valuable. Given its potential, I'm offering it to you for $11,000.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm. While I see the value in this product, $11,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at this point. I'm willing to pay $9,500.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $9,500.  Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $10,250?
